    • Method Detail

      • updateDB

        public static int updateDB(java.util.ArrayList<DetailedFlightBean> shoppingCart,
                           int user_id,
                           int account_id)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        This class loads the MySQL Driver and Connects to the entered database. Contrary to HW2, the bank has already be done. It only update the booking and booking_flights, and return the status of the execution
        Parameters:
        shoppingCart - the shopping cart
        user_id - the user_id
        account_id - the account_id
        Returns:
        0 if everything was OK, 1 if the account was not found, 2 if there was not enough money, 3 if there was a database problem
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception

      • Payement

        public static int Payement(int id,
                           int holder_id,
                           int routing_number,
                           int cost,
                           int pin)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Payement. This function look in the database if the account given by the user has enough money and if yes make the payment. It returns the status of the execution.
        Parameters:
        id - the account id
        holder_id - the holder_id
        routing_number - the routing_number
        cost - the cost (which will be deducted of the balance)
        Returns:
        0 if everything was OK, 1 if the account was not found, 2 if there was not enough money, 3 if there was a database problem
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception
